name: Lazer Cycles
description:
Use your motorcycle's trail to crash your opponents while using your riding skills to avoid crashing yourself!

Pick between three arenas of varying size and difficulty:

- Arena: small, relatively open map where the focus is out-riding your opponents

- Two-story Arena: large map with two levels providing ample room for many players

- City: large but crowded map where driving precision is key

Use powerups to gain an advantage or avoid a collision:

- Boost: Gain a short speed boost for getting ahead of opponents

- Jump: Launch yourself into the air to avoid colliding with trails

Play with up to 4 friends locally using controllers or with up to 8 friends online!

Controls (Keyboard / Xbox Controller):

W / Right Trigger - Accelerate

S / Left Trigger - Brake

A/D / Left Stick - Lean

Shift / Left Stick (Pull Down) - Wheelie

Q/E/Arrows / Right Stick - Look

Space/Down Arrow / Right Stick (Click) - Look Back

F / A - Use Powerup
